data.prayer: Father, help your children in Mbale, Uganda find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Mbale, Uganda
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Jesus, please find the broken hearted among the 76,500 souls in Mbale and mend their wounds.
data.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.

data.prayer: Spirit, give faith and responsive hearts to the 76,500 citizens of the the state of Mbale.
data.verse: Seek the Lord while he may be found; call upon him while he is near.

data.prayer: Father, convict the 25,359 believers in Mbale to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.

Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Swahili people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Lord, make the 25,359 believers in Mbale to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 51,141 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 25,359 believers in Mbale to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.prayer: Lord, teach your Word to the people of the the state of Mbale, so that they can follow your ways all their life.
data.verse: Teach me, Lord, the way of your decrees, that I may follow it to the end.

location.name: Mbale
location.people_groups_list: Amba, Plains Bira, Chinese, general, Arab, Lebanese, Nubian
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Amba (54,000), Plains Bira (2,000), Chinese, general (19,000), Arab, Lebanese (15,000), Nubian (37,000)
